restSearch module¶

Contains functions relating to searching for publications.

restSearch.addAuthors(self, pubs)¶
restSearch.advancedSearch(self, searchTerms, skip, length, sortBy, sort)¶
restSearch.decorateAdvancedSearchTerms(terms)¶
restSearch.getAdvancedSearchFields()¶
restSearch.getSQLQueryAndValues(terms)¶
restSearch.simpleSearch(self, searchTerm, skip, length, sortBy, sort)¶

Does a simple search on the database entries.

Parameters:
  • searchTerm – The string term to search the database for.
  • skip – An integer defining which result to return first: for pagination.
  • length – An integer defining how many terms to return: for pagination.
  • sortBy – A database column name to sort the results by.
  • sort – A string defining whether to sort ascending or descending.
Returns:

A stringified json array with objects containing details of publications matching the search-term
restSearch.sortDocuments(self, sortBy, sort)¶
restSearch.splitAdvancedSearchTerms(terms)¶
restSearch.updateAdvancedSearchTermsFields(terms, dbCols)¶
